english.segment1: Last day of the rest of my life. I wish I would've known. Cause I didn't kiss my mama goodbye
english.segment2: I didn't tell her that I loved her and how much I care. Or thank my pops for all the talks. And all the wisdom he shared
english.segment3: Unaware, I just did what I always do. Everyday, the same routine. Before I skate off to school
english.segment4: But who knew that this day wasn't like the rest. Instead of taking a test. I took two to the chest
english.segment5: Call me blind, but I didn't see it coming. Everybody was running. But I couldn't hear nothing
english.segment6: Except gun blasts, it happened so fast. I don't really know this kid. Even though I sit by him in class
english.segment7: Maybe this kid was reaching out for love. Or maybe for a moment. He forgot who he was. Or maybe this kid just wanted to be hugged. Whatever it was. I know it's because
english.segment8: [chorus:]. We are, We are, the youth of the nation
english.segment9: Little Suzy, she was only twelve. She was given the world. With every chance to excel
english.segment10: Hang with the boys and hear the stories they tell. She might act kind of proud. But no respect for herself
english.segment11: She finds love in all the wrong places. The same situations. Just different faces
english.segment12: Changed up her pace since her daddy left her. Too bad he never told her. She deserved much better
english.segment13: Johnny boy always played the fool. He broke all the rules. So you would think he was cool
english.segment14: He was never really one of the guys. No matter how hard he tried. Often thought of suicide
english.segment15: It's kind of hard when you ain't got no friends. He put his life to an end. They might remember him then
english.segment16: You cross the line and there's no turning back. Told the world how he felt. With the sound of a gat
english.segment18: Who's to blame for the lives that tragedies claim. No matter what you say. It don't take away the pain
english.segment19: That I feel inside, I'm tired of all the lies. Don't nobody know why. It's the blind leading the blind
english.segment20: I guess that's the way the story goes. Will it ever make sense. Somebody's got to know
english.segment21: There's got to be more to life than this. There's got to be more to everything. I thought exists
